Transformation Lab

Test Cloudinary image transformations in real-time. Enter your cloud name, public ID, and transformation parameters to see the results.

Lab 1

The image appears to be burned and is far too dark to read easily. Use a Cloudinary transformation in the Lab to enhance the image's contrast to find your first clue.

Create a free account at https://Cloudinary.com. Upload your image to the Media Library. Take note of your cloud name (listed in the top left dropdown menu of the console) and your uploaded image's public ID , which you can find by clicking on the image in the Media Library in the Summary tab.

Click the 'Lab' button and enter your cloud name and the image's public ID. Enhance the image which is very dark, but appears to have a word written on it. Hint: try the 'contrast' transformation. Once you have transformed the image, and the word is visible, select the letters from the options in the lab.
